titles.title: Fiscal Year 1994 BLM Authorization Act
Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995 BLM Authorization Act
Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995 BLM Authorization Act

To amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to authorize appropriations for programs, functions, and activities of the Bureau of Land Management, Department of the Interior, for fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1626)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-171.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 95.

action.text: Rules Committee Resolution H. Res. 218 Reported to House. Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2530 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. Points of order recommended by the Committee on Natural Resources now printed in the bill for failure to comply with clause 7 of rule XVI are waived. All points of order against the amendent printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution are waived.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 9/13/1993--Passed House amended. Fiscal Years 1994 and 1995 BLM Authorization Act - Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to authorize appropriations for programs, functions, and activities of the Bureau of Land Management (BLM) of the Department of the Interior through FY 1995. Changes the date for the Secretary of the Interior's submission of a request of authorizations for BLM programs, functions, and activities to January 1, 1994, and each second odd-numbered year thereafter.
